title: Main Effect and Interaction Plot
response: Response variable (specify a numeric variable to compute mean)
Fixed: Specify one or more grouping (Category) variable(s)
onePlotChk: All interactions in one plot (Uncheck for plotting each interaction separately)
noPlotsPerRow: Number of interaction plots per row (when left blank, default: number of groups -1)
angleX_axis_text: Angle to slant x-axis text labels for the interaction plot (when left blank, default: 25 degrees)
legends: Show Legends and if so, position of Legends (default is right)
colorHintLabel1: Select a color (After color selection, click outside the control to apply)

help.title: Interaction Plot
help.body:
Main effect plot to analyze effect of each categorical variables chosen on the mean of response variable
			Interaction Plot to analysze effect of interation of (pairwaise) two categorical variables on the mean of the response variable
